name: Functional Errors
description: Core app functionality is broken or not working as expected.

name: UI/UX Issues
description: Visual or user experience problems that affect usability without fully breaking functionality.

name: Performance Issues
description: The app is slow, unresponsive, or consumes excessive resources.

name: Connectivity Problems
description: Issues related to network connectivity, API failures, or data synchronization.

name: Authentication & Access
description: Problems with login, logout, sessions, permissions, or account access.

name: Data Integrity Issues
description: Data inaccuracies, corruption, duplication, or inconsistency.

name: Crash & Stability
description: App crashes, force closes, or becomes completely unusable.

name: Integration Failures
description: Problems with external services, hardware, or third-party integrations.

name: Configuration & Settings
description: Issues with app settings, preferences, or configuration options.

name: Compatibility Issues
description: Problems specific to devices, OS versions, browsers, or environments.

name: Feature Requests
description: User suggestions for new functionality or improvements (not bugs).

name: Unclear/Insufficient Info
description: Reports lacking enough detail to categorize or understand the issue.
